H0.text: The game Ticket to Ride involves what kind of transport. Bus

H1.text: The game Ticket to Ride involves what kind of transport. Airplane

H2.text: The game Ticket to Ride involves what kind of transport. Ship

H3.text: The game Ticket to Ride involves what kind of transport. Rail

A4.text: train pieces and ship pieces, with a corresponding train card deck and ship card deck, to be played on land routes and on water routes respectively

A5.text: Ticket to Ride is a series of turn-based strategy railway-themed Eurogames designed by Alan R. Moon

A6.text: rail transport (also known as train transport) is a means of transport using wheeled vehicles running on tracks, which usually consist of two parallel steel rails.

A7.text: Rapid transit refers to systems built in large cities and has the highest capacity of any passenger transport system.
